text: Delphine Gibson (August 17, 1903 - May 9, 2018) was an American Supercentenarian. She was born in Fairfield County, South Carolina. At the age of was the oldest person in the United States. She became the oldest living American upon the death of Adele Dunlap on February 5, 2017. She married Tyler Gibson in 1928. They had three children. Gibson lives in Huntingdon, Pennsylvania. She became the oldest living American citizen following the death of American emigrant Marie-Josephine Gaudette on 13 July 2017. Gibson died on May 9, 2018 at the age of 114. She was succeeded as the oldest living person in the USA by Ophelia Burks (25 October 1903 â€“ 27 September 2018). == Related pages == * List of American supercentenarians == References == Category:1903 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American supercentenarians Category:People from South Carolina Category:People from Pennsylvania
title: Delphine Gibson
